snippet.title: Toasterball - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Page : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142810/Toasterball/


This a short gameplay trailer for Toasterball (I know it's obvious but I mean, that's the description).


Toasterball is a multiplayer sport game (2-4 players), where you play as toasters. It's packed with crazy physics, random gameplay variants, explosions, and a bunch of toasts for you to burn !

Feel free to check us out on Twitter (https://twitter.com/studiocrafteurs) and of course, check out the game !

Here's the link again : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142810/Toasterball/


♥ Have a good day!

🍞 Toasterball  : https://linktr.ee/toasterball
🧰 Les Crafteurs : https://linktr.ee/studiocrafteurs
